noun.description: The highest point in the development of something; a climax or culmination.
examples: the White House is considered the apogee of American achievement

noun.description: The point in the orbit of the moon or a satellite at which it is furthest from the earth.

origin: Late 16th century: from French apogée or modern Latin apogaeum, from Greek apogaion (diastēma), (distance) away from earth, from apo from + gaia, gē earth.
